text: yah kitaab hai jise hamane utaara hai; barakatavaalee hai; apane se pahale kee pushti mein hai (taaki tum shubh-soochana do) aur taaki tum kendreey bastee (makka) aur usake chaturdik basanevaale logon ko sachet karo aur jo log aakhirat par eemaan rakhate hai, ve isapar bhee eemaan laate hai. aur ve apanee namaaz kee raksha karate hai
